Mahadum nke Lagos Cricket Oval bụ ogige cricket, na Akoka, Nigeria.
N'afọ 2020, osote onye isi nke Mahadum ọkà mmụta Oluwatoyin Ogundipe mere emume ịkpụ ahịhịa iji wughachi oghere Cricket ma kwe nkwa iwu ya na ụkpụrụ mba ụwa
Ndị Alumni nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ rụgharịrị oghere ahụ iji sọpụrụ Prof
Adebols Kukoyi onye gbara afọ iri asatọ n'oge ahụ.

N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2021, ala ahụ bụ ebe a na-eme usoro abụọ dị n'etiti ndị ọbịa Nigeria na Sierra Leone nke bụ T20Is mbụ a gbara na Nigeria ma bụrụkwa T20Is nke mbụ maka ndị otu cricket Sierra Leone. Usoro ahụ nyere akụkụ abụọ ahụ nkwadebe maka T20 World Cup Africa Qualifier na Nọvemba 2021. Usoro ahụ hụkwara mmeghachi omume nke asọmpi cricket ogologo oge n'etiti mba abụọ dị n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka.

N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2021, egwuregwu nke ise megide Sierra Leone, Peter Aho weere wickets isii maka ọsọ ise iji dekọọ ọnụ ọgụgụ kacha mma na egwuregwu T20I, n'akụkụ ịnye hat-trick, na-aghọ onye Naijiria mbụ na-eme egwuregwu cricket inye hat-trick.
